effect.en: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
effect.fr: Le Pokémon Défenseur est maintenant Endormi.

effect.en: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
effect.fr: Inflige 20 dégâts à chacun des Pokémon se trouvant sur le Banc de votre adversaire et ayant des marqueurs de dégât. (N’appliquez ni la Faiblesse ni la Résistance aux Pokémon de Banc.)

description.en: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.
